metaTags.metaDescription: Cloudflare is a global network on the edge of the Internet. Cloudflare brings you closer to your customers, employees, and partners by making everything you connect to the Internet secure, private, fast, and reliable.

twitterCustomImage.description: Cloudflare is a global network designed to make everything you connect to the Internet secure, private, fast, and reliable.

relatedBlades.title: What is Cloudflare?
relatedBlades.subtitle: Cloudflare is the cloud for the "everywhere world"
relatedBlades.copy:
Today, everything needs to be connected to everything everywhere, all the time. This hyperconnectivity creates new challenges related to security, performance, resilience and privacy. 

As the world's first __connectivity cloud__, Cloudflare helps connect and protect millions of customers globally. Everyone from individuals to the world's largest enterprises use our unified platform of networking, security, and developer services to succeed in the everywhere world.

features.title: SASE and SSE
features.description: Connect and secure your employees, contractors, devices, networks, apps, and data everywhere they live. Deliver Internet-native Zero Trust security and simplify your journey to unified SSE or SASE.

features.title: Fast app delivery and network infrastructure
features.description: Give your digital products and services top-notch security, reliability, and performance for customers everywhere. Reduce risk with built-in threat intelligence drawn from proxying ~20% of the web.

features.title: Full-stack development
features.description: Easily build and deploy full-stack applications everywhere, thanks to integrated compute, storage, and networking. Skip time-wasting development steps and improve  productivity with services that scale automatically.

relatedBlades.title: What makes Cloudflare different?
relatedBlades.copy: Cloudflare is built on an intelligent, secure, high-speed global network. We help businesses regain control of their technology and security environments by reducing complexity and improving visibility across their on-premises, public cloud, SaaS and public Internet domains. For individuals, we make the Internet safer, faster and more private.

contentfulAsset.description: Diagram of how Cloudflare defines the network edge

relatedBlades.title: A global immune system for your IT environment.
relatedBlades.copy: Cloudflare threat and network intelligence is built into every connection  and not tied to any one cloud provider  to help you stay ahead of the ever-evolving threat landscape. Cloudflare proxies approximately 20% of the web, and blocks an average of %{ThreatsBlockedPerDay} billion threats per day. Each and every login, request, and response that goes through our network strengthens the machine learning that we apply to detect and block threats, before they ever reach your organization.
relatedBlades.learnMoreText: Learn more about the Cloudflare security portfolio

imageAssetFile.altText: Cloudflare Global Network Immune System Illustration
imageAssetFile.title: Cloudflare Global Network Immune System Illustration

contentfulAsset.description: Illustration of a circle with a check mark

relatedBlades.title: Compliance and privacy are built-in.
relatedBlades.copy: Cloudflare is built with data protection in mind. We are a privacy-first company with end-to-end encryption. We comply with local regulations for data locality and storage. We do not generate revenue from advertising, and thus default against the collection and retention of personal data we process on your behalf.

relatedBlades.title: Your own fast-lane on the Internet.
relatedBlades.copy: Cloudflare's global network is often faster than the Internet. We provide direct connections to all major cloud providers and interconnect with nearly every service provider around the world. Our data centers in over %{DataCenterCount} cities deliver approximately %{OperationMilliseconds}-millisecond latency to about 95% of the Internet users in the world.
relatedBlades.learnMoreText: Learn more about the Cloudflare network

relatedBlades.title: Built for any and every organization
relatedBlades.copy: Cloudflare services are easy to integrate and manage, cost effective, and available from a single unified interface  helping even the largest and most specialized organizations reduce IT complexity and take back control of their environment. [We also offer robust security, performance, and development services for organizations of all sizes](https://www.cloudflare.com/plans/)  bringing enterprise-grade protection and speed to millions of startups, small businesses, and individual developers.
relatedBlades.learnMoreText: Learn more about Cloudflare for Enterprises

imageAssetFile.altText: Cloudflare for Enterprises Large and Small Illustration
imageAssetFile.title: Cloudflare for Enterprises Large and Small Illustration

features.title: Protect your Internet presence
features.description:
With Cloudflare, you can set up a domain in less than 5 minutes. Keep your hosting provider. No code changes required. 

Protect and accelerate all of your websites, apps, and APIs with unmetered DDoS protection, a global CDN, and more.

features.title: Implement Zero Trust access
features.description:
With Cloudflare Zero Trust, protecting your global workforce, applications and data does not require any hardware, software, or complicated licensing. 

You can start securing the first 50 seats on your team for free.
features.learnMoreText: Get started with  Cloudflare Zero Trust

features.title: Build serverless applications
features.description:
With Cloudflare Workers, you can deploy serverless code instantly across the globe to give it exceptional performance, reliability, and scale. 

You can deploy up to 30 Worker scripts and 100,000 requests per day for free.

relatedBlades.title: Learn about Cloudflare's Enterprise Plan
relatedBlades.copy: Does your organization demand advanced tools, support, and reporting? With Cloudflare's enterprise-tier plan, you get access to [enterprise-grade security](https://www.cloudflare.com/network-services/solutions/enterprise-network-security/) and performance, guaranteed reliability and uptime SLAs, and exclusive access to premium products, features, and 24/7/365 support.

relatedBlades.title: Cloudflare named a 2022 Gartner Peer Insights Customers' Choice for CDN and WAAP
relatedBlades.copy: Learn what enterprise tech professionals love about Cloudflare's global network.

relatedBlades.title: Trusted by millions of Internet properties
